name: Mahjong Solitaire (itch) (mahjong)
description:
Welcome to a modern version of the popular puzzle game - Mahjong Solitaire. Find identical tiles to remove them from the board!

Mahjong features:

  • Modern design
  • Optimized for mobile and tablet
  • 30+ original mahjong puzzles
  • 9 background themes
  • Relaxing music
  • Highlight open tiles for easier play
  • Unlimited hints
  • Unlimited shuffles
  • Enable timer to compete for your own best time
  • Earn stars for great performance
  • Daily Mahjong (coming soon!)
